data.market_trends: Growing interest in sustainable tourism and cultural immersion. Eco-friendly accommodations are gaining popularity.
data.consumer_behavior: Travelers are increasingly seeking off-the-beaten-path destinations, adventurous activities, and meaningful experiences.
data.competitive_landscape: Guatemala competes with Costa Rica and Mexico, but offers a unique blend of history and natural beauty that stands out.
data.seasonal_factors: Travel decisions in autumn are influenced by local festivals and climate conditions.
